lines.text:
[singing]
Start the day with a song / And sing the whole day through; / Even while you're busy working, / Do just like the birdies do. / Though the day may be long, / You never will go wrong. / Low key, high key, any old key, / Just start the day with a song.
Each year thousands of fun- and sun-worshiping vacationists flock to the Hawaiian islands, eight semi-tropical islands nestled like sparkling gems in the languid waters of the blue Pacific.

[singing]
This magic night of nights with you.
